entries.title: Smart search, Culture section, Practice mode & UI overhaul
entries.summary: Natural-language search, interactive flashcards, premium mega menu, and 78 new vocabulary phrases. Culture section with 45 sayings and proverbs.
changes: New: Culture & Expressions — 45 Portuguese sayings, proverbs, and idiomatic expressions; filter by theme and CEFR; pronunciation, copy, collapsible examples; Saying of the Day on homepage

New: Practice — Flashcards with 3D flip, configurable sessions (category, level, count, order, direction), familiarity tracking, results with review list and 'Practice these again'; keyboard shortcuts and swipe on mobile

New: Smart Search — understands 'how do you say kitchen?', 'conjugate ir', 'past tense of fazer', SER vs ESTAR; works in English and Portuguese; rotating hints and suggestion chips; Portuguese result labels (Vocabulário, Verbos, Gramática, Cultura)
Improved: Navigation — premium Learn mega menu with card layout and dynamic stats; 2 top-level items (Learn, Progress); What's New in user menu
Improved: Vocabulary index — white cards, themed sections (Essentials, Daily Life, World & Self), CEFR filter tabs, stats bar
Content: ~78 new words and phrases (598 to 676); survival phrases, everyday adjectives, restaurant/travel/health/work essentials
Added: Vercel Analytics and Speed Insights

entries.title: Major content expansion + full pronunciation
entries.summary: Massive update: restructured vocabulary, added 30 new verbs, created new categories, polished 10 grammar topics, and added audio pronunciation with phonetic transcriptions for all words and verbs.
changes: Restructured vocabulary from 6 broad categories to 13 focused categories
Added 30 new verbs: 71 total with 2,130 conjugations across 6 tenses
Total vocabulary: ~605 words across 13 categories
New: Colloquial & Slang category with 35 everyday EP expressions
Polished 10 grammar topics with improved rules and test questions
New: Audio pronunciation — tap the speaker icon to hear any word in European Portuguese
New: Phonetic transcriptions for ALL 605 vocabulary words and 71 verb infinitives
New: What's New page with changelog and daily digest banner
UI polish pass — consistent spacing, typography, colours, and responsive design

entries.title: Initial launch
changes: Launched Aula PT with 41 verbs and 1,230 conjugations
Built vocabulary reference with 383 words across 6 categories
Added 27 grammar topics covering A1 to B1
Homepage with Word of the Day and Verb of the Day
Linear progression system with CEFR sub-levels A1.1 to B1.5
